short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate the Refresh button click in Power BI Report Server

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A plugin to automate the refresh button click in Power BI Report Server. 
Users have the flexibility to set the refresh interval in two ways:
1. Input a custom value in the textbox
2. Select from dropdown options

The latest interval settings will be applied automatically to newly opened tabs and upon startup.
Take note that any changes made in the current tab will not be automatically implemented in tabs that are currently being opened.
